name: Toilet Simulator
description:
Immersive and associative first person experience. Played all AAA titles? Tired of copy-pasted mechanics used over and over again just because studios are too greedy to create something new or experiment? Looking for something unique? Look no further.

Hey you! Yeah, you. Tired of not being able to poop normally anymore? Missing good ol days when poop was smoother? Want to feel an excitement of easy poop again?
Look no further!

A full featured Toilet Simulator with a complex peeing system and hand-sculpted poop models. 20K polygons each!
That's more than in most of AAA games characters of the 2000s!

Features:
-You can Poop
-You can Pee
-Peeing features a complex mourse cursor system which enables you control the peeing apparatus
-AA graphics
-Character has a body
-Poop physics
-Cheat code
-Ability to summon a shit-shower
-Language settings
-2 camera modes
